channel.title: Face Detection on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Face Detection on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Example 2: Face Detection with OpenCV
item.description: Example 2: Face Detection with OpenCV Introduction This example uses the OpenCV WebCam Python script and adds a basic face detection. Info:  The Python code used in this example has been taken from Towards Data Science. Steps to do Open Example 1 Add the macro module developed in Example 1 to your workspace. Download trained classifier XML file Initially you need to download the trained classifier XML file. It is available in the OpenCV GitHub repository.
